body_html:
Still same problem here for tf 1.11.0 release. OS is Ubuntu 16.04. Python 3.5, cuda10 tensorflow installed from source.

Since I build tensorflow in a test directory and install it with pip3 install --user. pip merely issued a warning and proceeded.

After installed and ran a few tests (ignoring the warning) tensorflow and keras seem to work without problem.
body_text:
Still same problem here for tf 1.11.0 release. OS is Ubuntu 16.04. Python 3.5, cuda10 tensorflow installed from source.
Since I build tensorflow in a test directory and install it  with pip3 install --user. pip merely issued a warning and proceeded.
After installed and ran a few tests (ignoring the warning) tensorflow and keras seem to work without problem.
body:
Still same problem here for tf 1.11.0 release. OS is Ubuntu 16.04. Python 3.5, cuda10 tensorflow installed from source. 

Since I build tensorflow in a test directory and install it  with pip3 install --user. pip merely issued a warning and proceeded. 

After installed and ran a few tests (ignoring the warning) tensorflow and keras seem to work without problem.
